website_summaries.verdict: This is a fast-acting, versatile pain relief cream that makes it easy to fight pain.
pros: Easy to dispense bottle keeps things from getting too messy
Has a pleasant smell, isn't too greasy, and won't leave residue on skin or clothing
Relieves multiple types of pain, from muscle soreness to chronic arthritis
cons: Many users complain that the dispenser malfunctions or breaks

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is not "hot". It has a nice pleasant minty scent. I noticed it felt good on my knee and shoulder (ligament, joint, arthritis pain)the first time I used it. But after using it a few days I noticed that when it wears off (for me about 8-10 hours) I notice that the pain is back. Good long lasting pain relief. Bought the 4 oz. tube and within a week ordered the 12 oz. bottle. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael K Jones

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. We had tried it from a dealer at a craft show. The sample went a long way. My boyfriend has a bad back and this will ease the pain so he can sleep. I buy from Amazon all the time, so convenient to have it delivered to my door. I ordered and got it in 2 days without the hassle of contacting the dealer. It's worth a try if you have any aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: DPberry

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This helps chronic pain that nothing else has helped. Doesn't take it completely away but does help considerably.
customer_reviews.author: FinnGirl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work. Not Eligible for Refund
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both suffer from back pain, arthritis and I also suffer from Sciatica. I purchased this in hopes that it would relieve some of our pain, but unfortunately after using it two different times, it did nothing for either of us. I decided to return it and get our money back, as it is not cheat, BUT it stated that this item is not eligible for refund. That's awful, especially since it doesn't work for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Vagos

customer_reviews.title: The best pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pain relievers I've ever used. I use it on my legs. It feels like the skin is tingling and gets very uncomfortable. I put the lotion on and get immediate relief. For minor aches and pains in shoulders and neck it also works great. I've bought it a couple of times and gave to friends or family and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This cream has relieved leg cramps, diabetic nerve pain, and sprains, think it's the best. This size gives 3 tubes for the price of 2.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best products I've found for
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I've found for, not only muscle aches and pains, but for my advanced osteo arthritis as well. You use only a small dollop so it lasts forever. You cannot go wrong ordering this product for pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O'Mara

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a prescription topical pain killer and then heard the active ingredient in it was linked to heart attacks. A friend gave me a bottle of this stuff and wow. I don't know how, but it helps A LOT. I tried it on my husband's bad knee and the eternal skeptic said it helped him as well. Definitely recommend trying this. You can use it multiple times a day as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie A. Yeschick

customer_reviews.title: Fast acting, effective relief
customer_reviews.text: I have seasonal allergies during the summer the result of which is inflammation of the joints in my hands. I applied this cream and was very surprised at how quickly my hands felt better. It lasted about 6-8 hours even though I washed my hands several times throughout the day. I was able to get through my usual daily tasks with much less pain. I didn't care for the scent, so I layered another lotion over it. I would recommend this product and I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: 666k9s

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have polymylagia rheumatica (PMR)...this ointment has helped relieve a lot of pain on my joints as PMR attacks cartilage as well as muscles. . It doesn't take all pain away but it sure helps. I wouldn't be without it. It's a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Did not like at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not like at all. A friend of mine allowed me to us hers and it was really good. The bottle I received from Amazon seemed to have lost it strength quality. When I used the bottle I received it was not effective at all.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia A Warren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who had severe pain in her hand. She followed the directions and applied two applications, and the pain subsided - amazing! The only thing we noticed was if she washed her hands, the product also washed away and needed to be reapplied - no big deal. I need to purchase a travel size bottle so she can keep it in her purse for quick relief. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: My coworkers swear by this so got a bottle for ...
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers swear by this so got a bottle for my mother. She uses it for her arthritis and gets some measure of relief. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: MommyJo

customer_reviews.title: Amazeballs
customer_reviews.text: Works well for painful knees and light back pain. Great for sensitive skin, harsher pain creams can tend to be irritation sometimes. Smells good and that’s a big plus. Must reapply often is the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Immediate pain relief 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, doesn't make you feel like your going to freeze to death like other menthol products. It also has arnica in a rich cream that feels great. It has a mild odor that fades away pretty quick. Really helps stay asleep with pain.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Chicky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without this stuff. Stops arthritis pain in my thumbs in about 20 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief Cream That Works!
customer_reviews.text: This pain relief cream really helps with pain in my knee and ankle. Better than other things I have tried!

customer_reviews.title: Works very very well
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for arthritis - it works the best of anything he has tried. There's not any smell and it provides the heat and comfort he needs most of the time. It is a little costly but if it works it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sulea

customer_reviews.title: Great product that really works!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Real Time products for a few weeks after they were highly recommended by someone whom we met at a tradeshow. We have been very pleased with the results and will continue to use them for pain in nearly every part of your exposed body.

customer_reviews.text: I love this and it works great. My only problem was, the pump did not work. I have used this product in the past. I'm a nurse, and our backs are always sore, but this product is better than anything else on the shelf.

customer_reviews.text: This is the only pain cream that really helps my arthritis. I like it because it's not greasy & is does not smell medicinal. Works for me!

customer_reviews.title: Better than Icy Hot
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! It’s way better than Icy Hot and has become a staple in our home. The fragrance isn’t offensive and it works well. I put it on my husband’s back when he is sore and he likes it too.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. Apply as directed. I have RA and FM and it relieves the pain 95% of the time. My son in law now uses it for his work related muscle pain. It relieved the pain that my other son in law had due to cancer. Where has this stuff been hiding.

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way one pump can do your lower back your hands your

customer_reviews.title: Great product

Many types of pain reliefs have been used and failed. This product has not failed. It is very quick acting & long lasting. I highly recommend this.

customer_reviews.text: This lotion has a strong menthol smell, which isn't bad, but it hasn't helped with the arthritic pain in my hands. It's very expensive at $40. Unfortunately, it's not eligible to return, otherwise I would return it.

My beautician recommended this product and it does work. I will probably have to order smaller size next time.

Neck, muscle and joint pain it works wonders on. Although my heal spurs it seems to magnify the pain for a short period then it lessens. HIGHLY recommend this product.

I am very disappointed in the fact it's not returnable! Nowhere on the website does it indicate the item is not returnable if not satisfied! I went to return it and found out it was not able to be returned, but I still cannot find any policy anywhere that states this is true. It has been less than 1 week since I purchased it so it isn't like I waited weeks.

product_meta.title: Real Time Pain Relief Maxx, 12 Ounce
feature_bullets: Easy to Use- Real Time Pain Relief is designed for easy, everyday use. It absorbs quickly, is non-greasy, and smells great too!
Smells Great- Unlike other pain relief lotions with a medicinal smell, Real Time Pain Relief formulas are crafted to release a wonderfully fresh smell.

Recipe for Success- While virtually all of the name-brand topical pain relief companies utilize parabens, SLS and artificial dyes to keep their product cost down, Real Time Pain Relief is committed to not using these harmful chemicals. Additionally, Real Time Pain Relief formulas do NOT contain NSAIDs or acetaminophen.
FDA Registered OTC- Real Time Pain Relief offers FDA Registered Over-the-Counter (OTC) drugs. All Real Time Pain Relief formulas are made in a FDA monitored facility.

All Real Time Pain Relief formulas are made in a FDA monitored facility. Trusted Pain Relief- Thousands of Real Time Pain Relief customers have shared satisfied testimonials about finally finding pain relief that they can trust. Our family owned and operated business is proud to say that we’ve been around for over 20 years.
